input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is the ultimate tool for any professional or do-it-yourselfer. With its interchangeable bits, you'll never be without the right tool for the job. The chrome/nickel plating adds extra durability and the industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished for a longer life. The Crescent brand is known for its quality and this tool is no exception. It comes with one each of the following interchangeable bits: no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver. You'll never be without the right tool again with this 6-in-1 screwdriver.
input_text.Response B: The Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is a versatile tool that can be used for a wide variety of applications. It features chrome/nickel plated construction for durability and longevity. The industrial tool steel bits are heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, and blast finished for ruggedness and reliability. This is another quality Crescent product that is designed to meet the needs of professionals. The interchangeable bits include a No. 1 and No. 2 Phillips, 3/16-inch and 9/32-inch slotted, and 1/4-inch and 5/16-inch nutdrivers. The bits are easy to change and store neatly inside the handle. Whether you are working on electrical, plumbing, or automotive applications, the Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is the perfect tool for the job.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
